abstract.text: A set of date and time features.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: The choice of features for a particular task depends on the relevance of different date and time components. For
example a dataset of weather data may require hour and day-of-year features, while a dataset of workout metrics may
require second, hour, and weekday features.

abstract.text: Create more customizable machine learning models in your app.
